definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: "Comparative states"is one of TCM thought styles stated with uni-state theory.
sentences.chinese: 用唯象理論闡述中醫思維方式之一“取象比類”。

sentences.english: The distribution curves of residual stress for these samples were obtained based on the phenomenon theory of wall motion.
sentences.chinese: 根據磁疇壁運動唯象理論，得到殘餘應力分佈曲線。

sentences.english: Thermodynamics is a phenomenon theory of heat.
sentences.chinese: 熱力學是描述熱現象的宏觀唯象理論。

sentences.english: Based on macro-phenomenological theory, a yield function of phase-transforming material is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 利用宏觀唯象理論得出的相材料的屈服函數。
